name.description: Pipeline name. Must be unique within the workspace.

computeEnvId.description: Compute environment identifier where the pipeline will run. Defaults to workspace primary compute environment if omitted.

runName.description: Custom run name for the workflow execution.

workDir.description: Work directory path where workflow intermediate files are stored. Defaults to compute environment work directory if omitted.

revision.description: Git revision, branch, or tag to use.

sessionId.description: Nextflow session identifier for resuming failed runs.

configProfiles.description: Array of Nextflow configuration profile names to apply.

userSecrets.description: Array of user secrets to make available to the pipeline.

workspaceSecrets.description: Array of workspace secrets to make available to the pipeline.

configText.description: Nextflow configuration as text (overrides config files).

paramsText.description: Pipeline parameters in JSON or YAML format.

preRunScript.description: Add a script that executes in the nf-launch script prior to invoking Nextflow processes. See [Pre and post-run scripts](https://docs.seqera.io/platform-cloud/launch/advanced#pre-and-post-run-scripts).

postRunScript.description: Add a script that executes after all Nextflow processes have completed. See [Pre and post-run scripts](https://docs.seqera.io/platform-cloud/launch/advanced#pre-and-post-run-scripts).

entryName.description: Workflow entry point name when using Nextflow DSL2.

schemaName.description: Name of the pipeline schema to use.

resume.description: Enable resume to restart workflow execution from the last successful process. See [Resume a workflow run](https://docs.seqera.io/platform-cloud/launch/cache-resume#resume-a-workflow-run).

pullLatest.description: Pull the latest version of the pipeline from the repository.

stubRun.description: Execute a stub run for testing (processes return dummy results).

optimizationTargets.description: Comma-separated list of optimization targets. See [Pipeline resource optimization](https://docs.seqera.io/platform-cloud/pipeline-optimization/overview).

labelIds.description: Array of label IDs to assign to each pipeline run.

headJobCpus.description: Number of CPUs allocated for the Nextflow head job.

headJobMemoryMb.description: Memory allocation for the Nextflow head job in megabytes.

launchContainer.description: Container image to use for the Nextflow launcher.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the launch configuration was created.

labelIds.description: Array of label IDs to assign to the pipeline. If null, empty, or omitted, all existing labels are removed. Label IDs to be preserved must be included in your request.
